Class Location

java.lang.Object
location.Location
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class Location extends Object implements UserInterface
Represents a location where users can rent movies and leave reviews.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public int register(String username, String password, PersonalInformation info)
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      User registration. The chosen username must not already exist among the registered users.
      Specified by:
      register in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the (unique) username of the user.
      password - the user's password (must not be empty or null).
      info - personal information about the user.
      Returns:
      a code specifying the result of the registration: 0 if the registration was successful, 1 if the username was already used, 2 if the username or password was empty, 3 if the personal information was not properly specified.

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password)
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      User login. Once logged in, the user can access rental services and leave comments on the movies they have rented.
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the user's username.
      password - the user's password.
      Returns:
      true if the login was successful, false in case of invalid username/password combination.

      Retrieves the current user.

      the current user.

    • logout

      public void logout() throws NotLoggedInException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Logs out the currently logged-in user.
      Specified by:
      logout in interface UserInterface
      Throws:
      NotLoggedInException - if no user is logged in.

    • rentMovie

      public void rentMovie(Movie movie) throws NotLoggedInException, RentingException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      The logged-in user rents a movie. They can rent it if they have less than 3 movies currently rented and if they are old enough to watch the movie.
      Specified by:
      rentMovie in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to rent.
      Throws:
      NotLoggedInException - if no user is logged in.
      RentingException - in case of rental refusal, the exception will contain a message specifying the problem (already 3 movies rented, insufficient age, or other).

    • endMovieRental

      public void endMovieRental(Movie movie) throws NotLoggedInException, RentingException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Ends the rental of a movie.
      Specified by:
      endMovieRental in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie whose rental is ending.
      Throws:
      NotLoggedInException - if no user is logged in.
      RentingException - in case of a problem, especially if the user did not have this movie rented, the exception will contain a message specifying the problem.

    • isRentable

      public boolean isRentable(Movie movie) throws NotLoggedInException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Information on whether a movie is available for rental.
      Specified by:
      isRentable in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to check for rental availability.
      Returns:
      true if the movie is available for rental, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NotLoggedInException - if no user is logged in.

    • rentedMovies

      public Set<Movie> rentedMovies() throws NotLoggedInException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Returns the set of movies currently rented by the logged-in user.
      Specified by:
      rentedMovies in interface UserInterface
      Returns:
      the movies rented by the logged-in user or null if no movies are currently rented.
      Throws:
      NotLoggedInException - if no user is logged in.

    • addReview

      public void addReview(Movie movie, Review review) throws NotLoggedInException, RentingException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Adds a review to a movie from the logged-in user. The user must have rented the movie to comment on it (whether the movie is currently rented or was rented and returned previously). The user must not have already submitted a review for this movie.
      Specified by:
      addReview in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to review.
      review - the review of the movie.
      Throws:
      NotLoggedInException - if no user is logged in.
      RentingException - in case of an error adding the review, the exception will contain a message specifying the problem.

    • modifyReview

      public void modifyReview(Movie movie, Review review) throws NotLoggedInException, RentingException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Modifies the review that the logged-in user had already submitted for a movie. Can only be done if the user had already reviewed the movie.
      Specified by:
      modifyReview in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie whose review is being modified.
      review - the new review that replaces the previous one.
      Throws:
      NotLoggedInException - if no user is logged in.
      RentingException - in case of an error modifying the review, the exception will contain a message specifying the problem.

    • reviewsForMovie

      public Set<Review> reviewsForMovie(Movie movie)
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Returns the set of reviews for a movie.
      Specified by:
      reviewsForMovie in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie whose reviews are wanted.
      Returns:
      all the reviews of a movie or null if no reviews exist for the movie or if the movie was invalid (e.g., null value).

    • reviewsForMovie

      public Set<Review> reviewsForMovie(String title)
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Returns the set of reviews for a movie.
      Specified by:
      reviewsForMovie in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the movie whose reviews are wanted.
      Returns:
      all the reviews of a movie or null if no reviews exist for the movie or if the movie title was unknown or invalid (e.g., null value).

    • averageRating

      public double averageRating(Movie movie)
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Returns the average rating of a movie (the average of all the ratings of the reviews for the movie).
      Specified by:
      averageRating in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie whose average rating is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      the average rating of the movie or -1 if the movie has no reviews or -2 in case of an invalid movie (non-existent or null value).

    • averageRating

      public double averageRating(String title)
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Returns the average rating of a movie (the average of all the ratings of the reviews for the movie).
      Specified by:
      averageRating in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the movie whose average rating is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      the average rating of the movie or -1 if the movie has no reviews or -2 in case of an invalid movie title (no movie with that title or null value).
